name: Astronders
description:
Hello !

This is a game jam project organized by my school which lasted three days. The chosen theme was "Clicker". We made it simple because it was my first time as a programer working on a clicker.

Post your best high score in the comments ;)

Crédits : 

Game Designers : Tom Le-Corvic (Celulo), Cassandra Cousyn

Game Artists : Philémon Caron (Philémon), Alexis Depienne

Game Programer : Jean Mayeux (Jean. M. Studios)
